name: mark-deco-workspace
description: Workspace for mark-deco library and related tooling

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-test-shared && npm run build --workspace=mark-deco && npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-node-tests && npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-demo-pages && npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-e2e-tests && npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-cli
scripts.build:native: npm run build && npm run build:native --workspace=mark-deco-cli
scripts.dev: npm run build --workspace=mark-deco && npm run dev --workspace=mark-deco-demo-pages
scripts.test: npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-test-shared && npm run test:library && npm run test:cli && npm run test:node && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:library: npm run build --workspace=mark-deco && npm run test --workspace=mark-deco
scripts.test:node: npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-test-shared && npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-node-tests && npm run test --workspace=mark-deco-node-tests
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-test-shared && npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-e2e-tests && npm run test --workspace=mark-deco-e2e-tests
scripts.test:cli: npm run build --workspace=mark-deco-cli && npm run test --workspace=mark-deco-cli
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
